original: Leonardsson, Jarl Einar Emanuel, postmästare, Mönsterås, f. 7/6/82 i Säffle, Värml. 1., av pred. Leonard Peterson o. Emma Sofia Lindbom. G. 24 m. Alma Katarina Olsson. — E. o. postexp. i östra distr. 03, e. bitr. i Vingåker 04, v. järnv :po<sten i östra distr. 06, tf. postexp. där 08, postexp. där 09, förste postexp. 19, förste post-assist. 25, p0’stmäst. i Mönsterås sed. 41. GMnr.
translated: Leonardsson, Jarl Einar Emanuel, postmaster, Mönsterås, b. 7/6/82 in Säffle, Värmland, 1st son of preacher Leonard Peterson and Emma Sofia Lindbom. Married on 24/xx to Alma Katarina Olsson. - Trainee and postal clerk in the eastern district in 1903, assistant in Vingåker in 1904, mail carrier in the eastern district in 1906, temporary postal clerk there in 1908, postal clerk there in 1909, chief postal clerk in 1919, first postal assistant in 1925, postmaster in Mönsterås since 1941. Serial number in the spouses' marriage register is unknown.
